idea-plugin.name: Maestro YAML Highlighter
idea-plugin.description:
Comprehensive IDE support for Maestro mobile testing framework YAML files.

Features:
  • Syntax highlighting for ${VARIABLE} expressions with code-like highlighting
  • Intelligent code completion for commands, properties, and values
  • Context-aware suggestions based on cursor position
  • Warnings for incorrect variable syntax ($VARIABLE instead of ${VARIABLE})
  • Support for all Maestro commands and configuration options
  • Only applies to YAML files in 'maestro' folders
